name: ChristmasCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open christmas countdown”
”Alexa, start christmas countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas countdown
des: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until Christmas. We are getting closer to the most wonderful time of the year!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
